document.discussion_title: Rolex 116518 Daytona Cosmograph, Yellow Gold, Panda Dial for sale $14,500
document.topic_text: Small Seconds, Luminescent Numerals, Luminescent Hands Comments Condition: pre-owned, in mint condition. Box and papers: no box or papers. Reference: 116518 Movement: mechanical with automatic winding, Rolex Caliber 4130; 44 jewels; 28,800 vph; power reserve approx. 72 hours; Glucydur balance; fine adjustment using microstella screws; Breguet overcoil; Kif shock protection. Functions: hours, minutes, subsidiary seconds; chronograph. Case: 18 karat yellow gold; 40 x 12.4 mm (excl. lugs & crown); bezel with engraved tachymetric scale; screw-locked yellow gold push-buttons; screw-locked yellow gold crown with protective horns; screw-on case back. Water-resistant to 100 meters. Dial: white, with black sub-dials, so-called "Panda"; applied luminous yellow gold Arabic numerals; luminous yellow gold baton hands. Indications: minute counter at 3; subsidiary seconds at 6; minute counter at 9; chronograph sweep second hand. Strap: Rolex brown alligator, with yellow gold Rolex deployant clasp. FeelGoodWatches.com is not an authorized dealer for the brands offered, and we cannot advertise the watches we sell as new. The watches we sell are used, but some of them are unworn. There is no manufacturer’s warranty on this watch. We trust these timepieces to be of such high caliber that we warrant all watches we sell for a period of 1 year. You may also be interested in these watches from FeelGoodWatches, Inc.
